title: Robot and IoT-Based Language Education Design: Interdisciplinary Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic robotics, IoT concepts, language education principles, and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Participants are general citizens with diverse academic backgrounds, conducting practice-centered collaboration to integrate robotics and IoT technologies into language education.

learning_goals: Learners can design two or more language learning scenarios using robotics and IoT-based educational tools.
Learners can complete collaborative tasks while mediating professional disparities in interdisciplinary teamwork.
Learners can improve educational design prototypes at least three times based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
